title: 80/1054/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 October 1980 on implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (region of Latium) pursuant to Directives 72/159/EEC and 75/268/EEC (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 28 October 1980  on implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in Italy (region of Latium) pursuant to Directives 72/159/EEC and 75/268/EEC  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (80/1054/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The existing provisions implementing Directive 72/159/EEC and Titles III and IV of Directive 75/268/EEC, having regard to the Law of the region of Latium of 22 April 1980, continue to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the common measures referred to in Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC and Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.
2. The existing provision in the region of Latium implementing Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC, having regard to the Law of the region of Latium of 22 April 1980, continues to satisfy the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to the Community to the common measures referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 October 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 90, 3.4.1980, p. 43. (3)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1. (4)OJ No L 180, 14.7.1980, p. 34.
